meta.title: Contract #007: The Drop
meta.description: AVIATION INCIDENT: Drone crash. Weather report conflicts with RF Spectrum analysis.
meta.journal: The Weather Report was injected to mask the attack. The drone didn't crash because of wind; it lost control because a localized RF Jammer severed its link. Someone wanted that package in the river.

nodes.text: 13:50 - RF Scanner: High-power signal jammer active near Ha'penny Bridge.
14:00 - Weather API: Sudden localized gust (90km/h) recorded.
14:00 - Drone Telemetry: Connection Lost / Control Surface Lock.
14:01 - CCTV: Drone spins out and impacts water.
14:05 - Police Report: Officers secure package from riverbank.
